classOrder.description: Used to control the order in which the renderer classes are shown in the filter.

webMapId.description: The AGOL id of the web map that you want to point the app to.

defaultValue.value:
This web map depicts known existing bicycle paths, lanes, and paths.An alternate map view conveys a comparative level of traffic stress(LTS) that users might experience when bicycling along majorroadways.

This dataset is updated periodically but users are advised that themap may not reflect current conditions on the ground, and maycontain errors or omissions. User can click on any location on themap to indicate where updated data is needed.

Use of this information is at your own risk.

Planned bike features can be found in this map. opens in a new window

aboutContent.description: The html content displayed in the about/loading dialog.

layerNames.description: The names of the layers in the web map. The app uses these to get references to the layers for filtering and toggling.

fieldNames.description: Field names for any of the layers.
